column5: Stay comfy and cozy in a backyard cottage. Great location to access the Bishop Arts District and the rest of Dallas. Put your feet up or toss treats to the chickens!  Accommodations are in a tastefully finished backyard cottage. It has its own bathroom, wireless internet, and lovely views of the garden. A kettle and mini-fridge are there for your use.  Typically, we try to greet guests upon arrival. Once guests are set up, we leave them alone to enjoy their stay.
column8: Cute backyard casita - North Oak Cliff
